languages.text: "Я продолжу служить Императору, как служила всегда. Но теперь — не как неопытная сестра Сороритас, а как хранительница святыни, врученной мне судьбой по Его воле. Я хочу нести свет всем верующим Коронуса, как несла святая Арджента. И я знаю, что готова к этой миссии".

traits.locale_text: "Я продолжу служить Императору, как служила всегда. Но теперь — не как неопытная сестра сороритас, а как хранительница святыни, врученной мне судьбой по Его воле. Я хочу нести свет всем верующим Коронуса, как несла святая Арджента. И я знаю, что готова к этой миссии".

languages.text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."
languages.original_text: "Я продолжу служить Императору, как служила всегда. Но теперь — не как неопытная сестра Сороритас, а как хранительница святыни, врученной мне судьбой по Его воле. Я хочу нести свет всем верующим Коронуса, как несла святая Арджента. И я знаю, что готова к этой миссии".

traits.locale_text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

I want to bring light to all faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

"I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

languages.text: “我将一如既往，继续为帝皇效力。然而，我已经不再是羽翼未丰的战斗修女，而是在帝皇的旨意之下，成为了圣物的守护者。我想将光明带给科罗努斯扩区的所有信徒，正如圣阿洁塔生前所做的那样。我明白，我已经为这项使命做好了准备。”
languages.original_text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

traits.locale_text: “我将一如既往，继续为帝皇效力。然而，我已经不再是羽翼未丰的战斗修女，而是在帝皇的旨意之下，成为了圣物的守护者。我想将光明带给科罗努斯扩区的所有信徒，正如圣阿洁塔生前所做的那样。我明白，我已经为这项使命做好了准备。”

languages.text: «Continuaré sirviendo al Emperador, igual que hasta ahora... pero ya no seré una Hermana de Batalla novata, sino la guardiana de una reliquia de la que Su voluntad me ha hecho cargo. Quiero llevar la luz a todos los fieles de la Extensión de Koronus, de la misma forma en que santa Argenta lo hizo en su época. Y sé que estoy preparada para esta misión».
languages.original_text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

traits.locale_text: «Continuaré sirviendo al Emperador, igual que hasta ahora... pero ya no seré una Hermana de Batalla novata, sino la guardiana de una reliquia de la que Su voluntad me ha hecho cargo. Quiero llevar la luz a todos los fieles de la Extensión de Koronus, de la misma forma en que santa Argenta lo hizo en su época. Y sé que estoy preparada para esta misión».

languages.text: 「皇帝への奉仕はこれまで通り続けるつもりだ。しかし、駆け出しのバトルシスターとしてではなく、皇帝の意思により授かった聖遺物の保持者として勤めを果たすつもりだ。生前の聖アルジェンタと同様に、コロヌス・エクスパンスの忠実な者たちすべてに光をもたらしたい。さらに言えば、この使命に身を捧げる準備はもうできている」
languages.original_text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝への奉仕はこれまで通り続けるつもりだ。しかし、駆け出しのバトルシスターとしてではなく、皇帝の意思により授かった聖遺物の保持者として勤めを果たすつもりだ。生前の聖アルジェンタと同様に、コロヌス・エクスパンスの忠実な者たちすべてに光をもたらしたい。さらに言えば、この使命に身を捧げる準備はもうできている」

languages.text: "Ich werde meinen Dienst am Imperator fortführen, wie immer. Jedoch nicht mehr als junge Schwester der Schlacht, sondern als Hüterin eines Relikts, das mir durch seinen Willen gewährt wurde. Ich werde all den Gläubigen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Licht bringen, wie die Heilige Argenta es zu ihren Lebzeiten getan hat. Und ich weiß, ich bin bereit für diese Mission."
languages.original_text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde meinen Dienst am Imperator fortführen, wie immer. Jedoch nicht mehr als junge Schwester der Schlacht, sondern als Hüterin eines Relikts, das mir durch seinen Willen gewährt wurde. Ich werde all den Gläubigen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Licht bringen, wie die Heilige Argenta es zu ihren Lebzeiten getan hat. Und ich weiß, ich bin bereit für diese Mission."

languages.text: « Je continuerai à servir l'Empereur comme je l'ai toujours fait. Non plus en tant que Sœur de Bataille novice, mais en qualité de gardienne d'une relique à mes soins confiée par Son auguste volonté. J'entends apporter la lumière à tous les fidèles des Étendues de Koronus, comme Sainte Argenta l'a fait de son vivant, et je sais que je suis fin prête pour cette mission. »
languages.original_text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."

traits.locale_text: « Je continuerai à servir l'Empereur comme je l'ai toujours fait. Non plus en tant que Sœur de Bataille novice, mais en qualité de gardienne d'une relique à mes soins confiée par Son auguste volonté. J'entends apporter la lumière à tous les fidèles des Étendues de Koronus, comme Sainte Argenta l'a fait de son vivant, et je sais que je suis fin prête pour cette mission. »

languages.text: "Her zaman olduğu gibi İmparator'a olan hizmetime devam edeceğim. Fakat bunu artık çömez bir Harp Rahibesi olarak değil, O'nun iradesi ile bana bahşedilen bir yadigârın koruyucusu olarak yapacağım. Tıpkı zamanında Azize Argenta'nın yaptığı gibi ışığı, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki tüm inananlara taşımak istiyorum. Bu görev için hazır olduğumu da biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I will carry on in my service to the Emperor as I always have. But no longer as a fledgling Sister of Battle, but as the keeper of a relic that has been bestowed upon me by His will. I want to bring light to all the faithful in the Koronus Expanse, as Saint Argenta did in her lifetime. And I know I am ready for this mission."
